moving module

moving.move_to_cart(robot, R, T)[source]
moving.move_to_joint(robot: str, q_g: list)[source]

Move the robot to a specified joint configuration.

Parameters: - robot (str): The identifier or name of the robot. - q_g (list): The target joint configuration.

Returns: The result of the movement operation.

moving.move_to_location(robot: str, location: str)[source]
Parameters:

  • robot (str) – The robot object that will perform the movement.

  • location (str) – The name or identifier of the target location.

moving.teach_location(robot: str, location: str)[source]
Parameters:

  • robot (str) – The robot object that will be taught the location.

  • location (str) – The name or identifier of the location to be taught.
